EmailTemplate.name: 02-08-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Getting recycling right: how to simplify the process and get the most out of it
EmailTemplate.textOnly: So now you’re ready to embrace cash recycling and benefit from the efficiency and savings it offers. But it’s not as simple as just installing a new piece of hardware. You need to consider the complexities to ensure a smooth implementation that maximizes value and benefits for you and your customers. Check out our latest eBook on how best to implement an end-to-end cash recycling solution in your business. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
